Desc.entry: Part of Ruskin Mill Educational Trust, a national organisation that works with young people aged 16-25 who have learning development delay problems such as Aspergers, Autism and ADHD. Offers a practical craft curriculum including woodwork, metalwork (eg jewellery making, spoon-making, pewter and copperwork), and landwork (eg drystone walling and animal care). Has a large drama department and offers "Skills for Life" to develop basic literacy and numeracy skills. A registered charity.

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
